step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow a little straighter to feel more resistance.
Your fist was good and tight. Focus on opening your hand wide and relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
You made a good fist while inhaling. Remember to really open your hand and relax your fingers on the exhale.
Great job opening your hand and relaxing. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out of your arm with each breath.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and make a tight fist as you inhale. Then, open your hand wide and relax as you exhale to help move fluid.
